questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll receive an email with instructions to create a new password. For security reasons, password reset links expire after 24 hours.

questions.question: What insurance plans are accepted?
questions.answer: Divo works with a wide range of insurance providers including major national carriers and many regional plans. You can check if your insurance is accepted by entering your insurance information in your profile or when booking an appointment.

questions.question: How do I prepare for a virtual visit?
questions.answer: For the best virtual visit experience: 1) Test your device's camera and microphone ahead of time, 2) Ensure you have a strong internet connection, 3) Find a quiet, private, well-lit space, 4) Have any relevant medical information ready, and 5) Join the virtual waiting room 5-10 minutes before your scheduled time.

questions.question: How secure is my health information?
questions.answer: Your health information is protected with industry-standard encryption and security measures. We comply with all applicable healthcare privacy laws including HIPAA. We never share your personal health information without your explicit consent except as required by law.

questions.question: Can I use Divo for medical emergencies?
questions.answer: No. Divo is not designed for emergency medical situations. If you are experiencing a medical emergency, please call emergency services (911 in the US) or go to your nearest emergency room immediately.
